example.eg: The new bar in town serves lots of different beers.
example.egtrans: 镇里的新酒吧供应多种不同的啤酒。

example.eg: The cowboy walked up to the bar and ordered a beer.
example.egtrans: 牛仔走向吧台，点了啤酒。

example.eg: The concrete walls are reinforced with steel bars.
example.egtrans: 这面水泥墙有钢条加固。

dsense.name: bars
dsense.guideword: (steel grille in prison, etc.) (监狱等地的)

example.eg: The convicted criminal looked out through the bars of his prison cell.
example.egtrans: 这名罪犯从自己牢房的铁栅栏往外看。

example.eg: He used a metal bar to vandalise several parked cars.
example.egtrans: 他用一根金属棍毁坏了几辆停着的车。

example.eg: Sandy treated herself to a bar of chocolate. I usually have a cereal bar for breakfast.
example.egtrans: 桑迪奖励了自己一块巧克力。我早餐一般吃一块杂粮棒。

example.eg: The gymnast was performing an exercise on the bar.
example.egtrans: 体操运动员正在单杠上做着练习。

example.eg: The disco has barred Andy because of his crazy antics.
example.egtrans: 安迪动作疯狂滑稽，因此这家迪厅禁止他入内。

example.eg: The judge barred Lewis from driving for a year.
example.egtrans: 法官禁止路易斯开车一年。

example.eg: Place your bank card so the side showing the bar is uppermost.
example.egtrans: 请将你卡片有磁条的一面向上放置。

example.eg: Because of his behaviour, he was subject to a bar in many of the town's shops.
example.egtrans: 由于他的行为，镇上多数的商店都禁止他入内。

example.eg: The composer hummed a few bars of his new song.
example.egtrans: 作曲家哼唱了他新歌中的几个小节。

example.eg: The solicitor leaned over the bar to talk to the barrister.
The prisoner at the bar looked very worried.
example.egtrans: 在隔离间里的犯人看起来神色慌张。

trans_examp.trans_cn: （法庭上关押罪犯的）隔离间, 小隔间, 被告席

example.eg: The California bar approved Mr. Black to practice law.
The fishing boat ran aground on a bar.
example.egtrans: 那艘渔船搁浅在沙滩上。

example.eg: During the storm, the pressure dropped to twenty-eight bars.
example.egtrans: 风暴期间，气压降至28巴。

example.eg: The bars on the electric fire were glowing with a bright orange colour.
example.egtrans: 电暖炉上的供热电阻丝闪着明亮的橘色光芒。

example.eg: He won the Distinguished Conduct Medal and bar in the war.
example.egtrans: 在战争期间，他赢得了杰出行为勋章以及勋带。

dsense.name: bar
dsense.guideword: US (metal bar on uniform) (制服上的)

example.eg: You can tell his rank by the number of bars on his uniform.
example.egtrans: 你可以从他制服肩章上的横条数量来判断他的军衔。

example.eg: The content of this film is well below the bar of decency, so it ought to be banned.
example.egtrans: 这部影片内容的道德门槛太低，应该被禁播。

example.eg: I hate all vegetables bar carrots.
For safety, Simon bars his door every night.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 闩住, 锁住, 栓住

example.eg: The security officers barred the entrance to the bank.
I am going to paint this wall white, then bar it in black.
All of the exits had been barred, and there was no way to escape.
example.egtrans: 所有的出口都被封锁了，逃不掉了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 挡住, 堵住, 封锁

example.eg: The victim waited too long, and now her claim is barred by the state's statute of limitations.
Even after you finish law school, you can't practise law till you pass the bar exam.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 司法考试, 律师资格考试

example.eg: I have a mini bar blade on my key ring especially for opening bottles at the beach.
I used a bar chart to compare lifespans of different animals.
The shop assistant couldn't scan the bar code because it was covered up by a label.

dsense.name: pub crawl, also US: bar crawl
dsense.guideword: informal (barhop: visit to a series of bars)

example.eg: To celebrate Evan's birthday, his mates took him on a pub crawl.
Bar lines separate the measures in a piece of music.

dsense.name: bar mitzvah
dsense.guideword: (ceremony for Jewish boy) (犹太男孩的成人仪式)

example.eg: My nephew did a beautiful job of the Torah reading at his bar mitzvah.

dsense.name: bar of soap, cake of soap

example.eg: If your zipper sticks, rub a bar of soap over the zipper teeth to lubricate it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一块肥皂, 一块香皂

dsense.name: bar soap
dsense.guideword: (soap in the form of a bar)

example.eg: Bar soap is messier than liquid soap, but cheaper.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 块状肥皂, 块状香皂

example.eg: Alice was sitting on a bar stool with a drink in her hand.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 酒吧凳, 吧凳, 酒吧高脚凳

dsense.name: barhop, bar-hop
dsense.guideword: US, figurative, informal (pub crawl) (非正式用语)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逛酒吧, 从一家酒吧喝到另一家

example.eg: A candy bar is not a healthy snack.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 独立包装的块状糖, 块状巧克力糖

example.eg: I didn't have time to cook breakfast, so I ate a cereal bar instead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 巧克力棒, 巧克力条, 巧克力块

example.eg: Starbucks turned the coffee bar into a multinational enterprise.

dsense.name: color line (US), colour line (UK), color bar (US), colour bar (UK)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 种族界限, 种族分界线

example.eg: After 50 km of riding, I ate an energy bar and then rode another 50 km.
The prosecutor in the Smith case will go before the bar on ethics charges.
The USA keeps gold bars at Fort Knox.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 燕麦棒, 燕麦能量棒

example.eg: I took my boots to a heel bar to have the worn soles replaced.
Horizontal bar A shows greater value than horizontal bar B.
She cleared the horizontal bar at 2 metres to win the gold medal.
A new juice bar opened recently near campus.
Sarah was invited to the lounge bar for drinks.
Even though he went to law school, he cannot work as a lawyer because he is not a member of the bar.

dsense.name: minibar, mini-bar
dsense.guideword: (small fridge in hotel room) (宾馆、旅店客房内的)

example.eg: There's a minibar in your hotel room.
Julie goes to a nail bar to have her manicure done professionally.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 提高标准, 提高要求
沙堤, 沙坝, 沙洲

example.eg: He found her in a sleazy bar trying to drown her sorrows.
I'll go to the snack bar to get us some popcorn and sodas at half-time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 播放体育比赛的酒吧, 运动酒吧

dsense.name: stabilizer bar, antiroll bar, antisway bar, sway bar, also UK: stabiliser bar

trans_examp.trans_cn: 脱衣舞店, 脱衣舞酒吧

example.eg: A whammy bar lets the guitar's tone fluctuate in pitch.
In the 1980s wine bars were seen as more sophisticated than the local pub.
